mapper.select: SELECT MaLoai,Ghe.MaGhe,TenGhe FROM ChiTietGhe JOIN Ghe on Ghe.MaGhe = ChiTietGhe.MaGhe WHERE MaPhong = #{MaPhong}

SELECT Ghe.MaLoai,Ghe.MaGhe,TenGhe,ve.IdVe, (LoaiGhe.phuthu+XuatChieu.giaxuatchieu) as gia FROM ChiTietGhe JOIN Ghe on Ghe.MaGhe = ChiTietGhe.MaGhe join PhongChieu on PhongChieu.MaPhong = ChiTietGhe.MaPhong join XuatChieu on XuatChieu.MaPhong = PhongChieu.MaPhong join NgayChieu on NgayChieu.stt = XuatChieu.stt left join ve ON ve.mactghe = ChiTietGhe.mactghe join LoaiGhe on LoaiGhe.MaLoai = Ghe.MaLoai WHERE MaPhim = #{maPhim} and XuatChieu.ngay = cast(#{ngay} as date) and NgayChieu.GioBatDau = cast(#{gioBatDau} as time) order by ChiTietGhe.mactghe
